text: Edmund F. Mansure (March 14, 1901 – January 25, 1992) was an American businessman who served as Administrator of the General Services Administration from 1953 to 1956. He died of Alzheimer's disease on January 25, 1992, in Menlo Park, California at age 90. ==References== Category:1901 births Category:1992 deaths Category:Administrators of the General Services Administration Category:Illinois Republicans
title: Edmund F. Mansure
